root.name: Chuck Rock II: Son of Chuck
root.description: PlotChuck Rock II supposedly takes place roughly a year/year and a half after the events of the the first Chuck Rock. Our hero and previous title, prehistoric ass-kicker Chuck Rock has become a rising business man who excels at carving automobiles from stone which sparks envy from his competitor compelling him to kidnap Chuck. Our pint sized Chuck Jr. springs into action on a quest to rescue our favorite beer-gutted, grass-skirt wearing hero.
